body: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Play Benalish Lancer, pay the kicker What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Benalish Lancer should get two +1/+1 counters, and first strike. It does get the counters, but lacks first strike. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.21 on Windows XP
author: [i...@tandetnik.org](https://code.google.com/u/100964988663965718405/)
title: Benalish Lancer doesn't get first strike when kicked

comments.body:
Thank you for the report.

I tried a test game and Benalish Lancer did get the counters AND first strike. The code also looks fine to me. I can't think of any effect that would prevent Benalish Lancer to get the first strike ability but maybe what you saw was because of some interaction with another card?
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

Thank you.

I encountered this case again (this time with 1.24). Right after I played it, Benalish Lancer had first strike. But the moment I hit the blue arrow, first strike disappeared. Screenshots #1 and #2 are taken before and after. Screenshots #3 and #4 are taken as soon as I got a chance to switch to text view and open history window.
